comment:
* A fragment that displays a WebView. *

* The WebView is automically paused or resumed when the Fragment is paused or resumed. * * @deprecated Manually call {@link WebView#onPause()} and {@link WebView#onResume()}

methods.name: public View onCreateView(LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container, Bundle savedInstanceState)
methods.comment: * Called to instantiate the view. Creates and returns the WebView.

methods.name: public void onPause()
methods.comment: * Called when the fragment is visible to the user and actively running. Resumes the WebView.

methods.name: public void onResume()
methods.comment: * Called when the fragment is no longer resumed. Pauses the WebView.

methods.name: public void onDestroyView()
methods.comment:
* Called when the WebView has been detached from the fragment.
     * The WebView is no longer available after this time.

methods.name: public void onDestroy()
methods.comment: * Called when the fragment is no longer in use. Destroys the internal state of the WebView.

methodNames: public View onCreateView(LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container, Bundle savedInstanceState)
